attributes.action: Stop Rishi Sunak increasing the minimum income for visa applications.
attributes.additional_details: The new income rules are ludicrous. Of course it will reduce immigration, but we need to focus on the bigger picture. Other things can be done to increase the efficiency of the country, things that may not be directly related to immigration. There are lots of skilled workers who will have no option of coming to the UK, leaving us with little economical growth. Setting rules which only allow rich people into the country would further increase income inequality.
attributes.background: The five point plan needs to be reassessed, or the average UK income needs to increase in line with the new £38.7K visa conditions.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Cancel increase to minimum income requirement for Skilled Worker and Family visa: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652619

Don’t increase the income requirement for family visas to £38,700: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602
